name: Artistsay Museum
description:
Virtual Art Museum packaged as an ARPG. This way, a large range of community generated art can be showcased. Ranging from custom characters and enemies to weapons, skills and much more.  

Explore and discover art created by professional artists around the world. 

Community events / Sculptober 2021

The Doodlers - NPCs dedicated to individual community members. Currently, they have the ability to send you to a member's portfolio. 

Our Artistsay discord server is the main location of discussion and interaction. Would love to have you be a part of our steadily growing community! https://discord.gg/mSt5H2grWc

Hello! My name is Muhammed Softic and I'm the person behind Artistsay. Artistsay is an ongoing project I started years ago with one specific purpose. Creating a place for you and your art. 

I'm fully committed and this is just the beginning!
